title-education: Excellence in the field of education

messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

home.salem-text: Education is a place where students encounter innovations and prepare for tomorrow's challenges.
home.teachers-text: Meet the team of dedicated teachers who strive to provide our students with the highest quality of education and support.

about.title: About our polytechnic
about.school-title: Our school has been providing quality education since 1998. We are developing not only academic but also cognitive, critical thinking, creative, and social skills for our students.
about.school-p: We believe that every student has unique abilities, and our mission is to help them discover and develop these abilities.
about.our-director: Kanglibekov Kuatbay Dauletbaevich has more than 25 years of experience in the field of education and has been managing our school with vision and dedication.
about.academic-p: Khabibullaev Kudaybergen Allambergenovich supervises our educational programs that ensure high standards and innovative teaching methods.
about.affairs-p: Dauletniyazov Islam Dauletbaevich coordinates the work of students and ensures a comfortable environment for all students.
about.modern-p: Equipped with the latest technology to enhance the learning experience.
about.library-p: A vast collection of books, digital resources, and quiet study spaces.
about.labs-p: State-of-the-art computer labs with the latest software and hardware.
about.sports-p: Indoor and outdoor sports facilities for various activities and physical education.

gallery.gallery-p: Explore our school life through photos of events, rooms, and student activities.

news-page.news-p: Stay updated with the latest news, events, and announcements from our school community.

schedule-page.schedule-text: Download the lesson schedule for the desired class in a convenient PDF format..
schedule-page.download-schedule-text: Select a class and format to download the schedule
schedule-page.errors: If you find any errors, please contact the academic department.
schedule-page.available-schedules-p: List of all schedules available for download

rules-documents.rules-documents-p: Our school maintains clear rules and policies to ensure a safe, respectful, and productive learning environment for all students.

support-faq.support-faq-p: Find answers to frequently asked questions and get the information you need about our school.

education-page.education-p: Our school offers a comprehensive educational program designed to develop well-rounded students with a strong academic foundation and practical skills.
